Posts.Content: May 15, 2013 08:15PM krisf wrote: Love Love my Lymphediva sleeves.  I have had a few. Just throw in the washer and dryer but they say don't use fabric softner.  I wear the glove for about half the day then take it off. I have read where without the glove it could trap the swelling in your hand.  I wear the half glove though can't stand it being to the top of my fingers.
Posts.Title: ALL THINGS Gloves and sleeves purple32 tsoebbin
